metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20069 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Failure to prevent navigation to top frame to data URLs in Navigation in Google Chrome on iOS prior to 71.0.3578.80 allowed a remote attacker to confuse the user about the origin of the current page via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
